item.title: HTC has launched the HTC Desire 826 dual sim, promising an exceptional mobile audio experience
item.description: Source: HTC. The Blue Lagoon version. HTC is enhancing the mobile audio experience with its Desire 826 dual sim phone, featuring HTC BoomSound and Dolby Audio surround sound. This makes HTC the first smartphone manufacturer to integrate dual front-facing stereo speakers, a precisely adjusted sound profile, and Dolby’s decoding technology for a comprehensive multi-channel audio solution. This combination provides listeners with a level of audio depth and range not typically found in mobile devices.
